actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.

official_title: To amend the Dodd-Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act to improve the transparency, accountability, governance, and operations of the Office of Financial Research, and for other purposes.
short_title: The Office of Financial Research Accountability Act of 2014

titles.title: The Office of Financial Research Accountability Act of 2014

To amend the Dodd-Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act to improve the transparency, accountability, governance, and operations of the Office of Financial Research, and for other purposes.
